P&P.title: P&P
P&P.body: Prog & Pils is just like TekKom but with alcohol! This makes for a more fun and unpredictable environment, but can occasionally produce less optimal code. Nonetheless it makes programming a lot more exciting!

Cyberdays.title: Cyberdays
Cyberdays.body: Cyberdays is Login's annual career day event, where you get to meet relevant companies. This is the prime opporunity for establishing connections and finding your future workplace. This is the event you don't want to miss!

BedCTF.title: BedCTF
BedCTF.body: Company CTF, this is a CTF, but hosted by a company from the field. Here you will get to see the technical competence of a company, and maybe learn something new!

Cancelled.title: Cancelled
Cancelled.body: This event has been canceled. Contact the hosting committee for more information regarding why it has been canceled. Join the committee if you would like to help arrange this event in the future.

Workshop.title: Workshop
Workshop.body: This event is a workshop, meaning there will be technical insights, and you will get hands on experience. Its like a bedpres, just that you get to experience what the work is actually like.

Highlighted.title: Highlighted
Highlighted.body: This event is highligted. Highlights are a special feature that gives the event extra exposure. You should look for these events, as they are one of a kind, and often talked about for a long time afterwards!
